resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104044</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104044</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Environmental Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Environnementale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Ambiental</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Ambientale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιβαλλοντική εκπαίδευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Educación Ambiental</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">contains environmental science resources and is oriented to teachers searching for classroom projects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">enthält Klimawissenschaft Betriebsmittel und wird
den Lehrern orientiert, die nach Klassenzimmerprojekten suchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contient les ressources environnementales de la 
science et est orienté aux professeurs recherchant des projets de 
salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contem recursos ambientais da ciência e é 
orientado aos professores que procuraram por projetos da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contiene le risorse ambientali di scienza ed è 
orientato verso gli insegnanti che cercano i progetti dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιέχει τα περιβαλλοντικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς 
επιστήμης και είναι προσανατολισμένος στους δασκάλους που ψάχνουν
για τα προγράμματα τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contiene recursos ambientales de la ciencia y se 
orienta a los profesores que buscan para proyectos de la sala de 
clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104044</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/environmental-education-1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
